00030 /*
00031  * <meta name="usage" content="experimental"/>
00032  *
00033  * Base class for the DOM DocumentFragment interface.
00034  *
00035  * This class is experimental and subject to change!!
00036  */
00037 
00038 class XALAN_DOM_EXPORT XalanDocumentFragment : public XalanNode
00039 {
